sentence.Network_en: Wheresoever the carcase is, there will the ravens be gathered together.
sentence.Network_cn: 哪里有死尸, 哪里就有乌鸦麇集.

sentence.Network_en: Wheresoever this sutra may be found the Buddha and His respected disciples will be there also.
sentence.Network_cn: 若是经典所在之处,则为有佛,若尊重弟子.

auth_sentence.content: Dr.Chopra talks of value-based society committed to serve with utmost dedication wheresoever one is engaged in any avocation!
